title: technology gaps
extract: Definition of: technology gap (1) The difference between people who use computers and mobile devices on a daily basis and those who do not. Also known as the "digital divide" or "app gap." See creative destruction.
extract_html: Definition of: technology gap (1) The difference between people who use computers and mobile devices on a daily basis and those who do not. Also known as the "digital divide" or "app gap." See creative destruction.
